example.eg: We have a clothing store close to home.
example.egtrans: 我家附近有一个服装店。

example.eg: We keep our store of batteries in the basement.
example.egtrans: 我把我们的电池储备品放在地下室。

example.eg: They bought a cat to catch the mice that kept finding their way into the grain store.
example.egtrans: 他们买了只猫来抓那些总是能找到方法进到仓库的老鼠。

example.eg: I stored the rest of the cake for tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 我把剩余的蛋糕留起来明天吃。

example.eg: We stored the old books in the basement.
example.egtrans: 我们把旧书存放在地下室。

example.eg: Computers have two main types of stores, main memory (RAM) and auxiliary memory (e.g. hard disks).
example.egtrans: 计算机主要有两种存储类型，主要存储（内存（RAM））以及辅助存储（比如：硬盘）。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 计算机内存，计算机存储

example.eg: This disc drive can store a huge amount of data.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 储存, 储备, 贮藏
大型商场, 大型购物中心

dsense.name: bridal store, also UK: bridal shop

example.eg: Bridal shops are reporting the usual spring increase in business.
I am going to the candy store to buy some chocolate.
Chain stores have been the death of independent retailers.
The new mall has a clothing store that carries all of the styles that I like.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将...存入冷藏库, 把...放入冷库

example.eg: Confectionery stores are rare now; most people buy sweets at grocery stores and big box stores.
I'll just run down to the convenience store on the corner to pick up some toilet paper.
example.egtrans: 我要跑去楼下街角的便利店买点厕纸。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 便利店, 方便商店, 自助小超市

example.eg: I'm off to the dairy to pick up a newspaper.
Macy's is a famous department store in New York City.
example.egtrans: 梅西百货是纽约市一家著名的百货公司。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 百货商场, 百货商店

example.eg: Wal-mart and Kmart are well-recognized American discount stores.
These sunglasses were only a buck at the dollar store.
Mary drove to the drug store to buy aspirin.
You won't find groceries or hardware at a dry goods store.
example.egtrans: 纺织品商店里可没有日常百货或者五金商品。

example.eg: The fish store sells a wide variety of tropical fish.
We purchased fresh strawberries from a local fruit store.
I went to the furniture store to look for a new sofa.

dsense.name: general store
dsense.guideword: US (shop selling a variety of goods)

example.eg: Because of big shopping malls and supermarkets, it's hard to find a general store these days.
Stella needed food, so she made a stop at the grocery store.
example.egtrans: 斯特拉需要食物，所以她顺道去了一趟杂货店。

example.eg: I went to the hardware store to buy a hammer.

dsense.name: have in store, hold in store

example.eg: Nobody knows what tomorrow has in store.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 未来会有, 将来会发生什么

dsense.name: have [sth] in store for [sb], hold [sth] in store for [sb]

example.eg: Let's wait and see what next year has in store for us.

trans_examp.trans_cn: …即将发生在某人头上, 有…等待着某人

example.eg: You can buy tofu in the health food store.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有机天然食品店, 健康食品店, 保健食品店

dsense.name: in store
dsense.guideword: figurative (about to happen, for the future)

example.eg: I always read my horoscope in the newspaper to find out what is in store for me.
I stopped by the liquor store and bought a bottle of rum for tonight's party.
The pet store sells a wide range of tropical fish.
We have a retail store in the mall and a discount outlet store at the factory.

dsense.name: sales clerk. store clerk (US), sales assistant, shop assistant (UK)

example.eg: If you need help locating something in the store, just ask a sales clerk.
They only sell golf shoes in that specialty store.
example.egtrans: 那家专卖店里只出售高尔夫球鞋。

example.eg: The assistant went to the stationer's to buy more paper and pens.
The advent of electronic communications has all but killed the local stationery store.
Jim stored away provisions for emergencies.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 商店信用卡, 客户信用卡
商店会员卡, 商店积分卡
店铺抵用金, 商场信用积分

example.eg: The clerk wouldn't give me a refund so I asked to speak to the store manager.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 商店经理, 店铺经理

example.eg: Thieves broke into the store shed and stole a lawnmower.
Shop-bought bread lasts longer than home-made.
I bought these vintage shirts at a thrift store.
example.egtrans: 这些复古衬衣我是在一家廉价旧货店买的。

example.eg: In the weeks before Christmas, toy shops are packed.

dsense.name: video store, UK: video shop
dsense.guideword: dated, US (shop selling videocassettes) (旧时用语)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 音像销售店，盒式录像带销售店

dsense.name: video store, UK: video shop
dsense.guideword: dated, US (place for renting videocassettes) (旧时用语)

example.eg: I'm going to the video store to get a movie for tonight.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 音像租赁店，盒式录像带租赁店
